body_html:
Here you can see the log after terminating the script: https://gist.github.com/milani/42f50c023cdca407115b309237d29c70

UPDATE: I confirm that I could resolve the issue with increasing SHMMNI . On Ubuntu 17.04, I added kernel.shmmni=8192 to /etc/sysctl.conf.
body_text:
Here you can see the log after terminating the script: https://gist.github.com/milani/42f50c023cdca407115b309237d29c70
UPDATE: I confirm that I could resolve the issue with increasing SHMMNI . On Ubuntu 17.04, I added kernel.shmmni=8192 to /etc/sysctl.conf.
body:
Here you can see the log after terminating the script: https://gist.github.com/milani/42f50c023cdca407115b309237d29c70

UPDATE: I confirm that I could resolve the issue with increasing SHMMNI . On Ubuntu 17.04, I added `kernel.shmmni=8192` to `/etc/sysctl.conf`.
